      • messageAlreadyHandledbyLocalNode

        public boolean messageAlreadyHandledbyLocalNode()
        Checks if this message has already been sent to another node via this host (only relevant in distributed mode). This avoids message loops via connected platforms (e.g. events).
        Returns:

      • addLocalNodeToSenderLog

        public void addLocalNodeToSenderLog()
        Adds local node to list of nodes which have passed this message via network.
